note.p: Career: Went to England; Assistant to Warren De La Rue (FRS 1850); worked with John Stenhouse (FRS 1848); gave up science; joined the firm De La Rue and Co, incharge of stamp department; retired from business; worked in the Davy-Faraday Laboratory, Royal Institution
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1918-1919 vol 95 pp xii-xxv, plate, signed by H E A
References: Lawrence Badash, 'British and American Views of the German Menace in World War I' in NR 1979-80 vol 34 pp 91-121
